name: Cranial Adjustment
description: You have learned to manually adjust the plates that make up the skull, inducing altered states in your subjects.
benefit: You can perform the hypnotism occult skill unlock<sup>OA</sup> even if you canâ€™t use psychic magic. If you can cast psychic spells or have the Psychic Sensitivity<sup>OA</sup> feat, you can use hypnotism one additional time per day.
